membership:
Serbia is an European EBA observer. As they are neither EU member nor EFTA state, they could not enter the alliance as member, according to EBA Statutes. 
 
American Blood Centres (ABC), collecting and distributing around 50 % of the blood and blood components in the USA, has a status of observer within EBA.  
 
EBA is member of the Alliance of Blood Operators (ABO), with blood establishments from Australia (ARCBS), Canada (CBS), UK (NHSBT), and USA (ABC, ARC and BSI). Active networking with these organizations allows sharing valuable information and practices worldwide. 
 
Collaboration with Industry and Regulators: 
managed regulatory convergence, with a pilot on apheresis connector safety: development of ISO standards to avoid any misconnection and possible serious adverse reactions in donors and patients.
